description:
Uryu, Chad, and Orihime confront Muramasa who has entered the World of the Living. Using teamwork, Uryu and Chad at first appear to gain the upper hand in battle, when Senbonzakura appears to assist Muramasa.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le Bankai de Senbonzakura ! La bataille du monde des vivants
Senbonzakura`s Bankai! Offense and Defense of the Living World
Senbonzakuras Bankai! Angriff und Verteidigung der lebenden Welt
千本桜卍解! 現世の攻防
